scripts.dev: concurrently -n "backend,frontend,electron" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=apps/frontend && npm run build --workspace=apps/backend
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:prod --workspace=apps/backend && npm run build:prod --workspace=apps/frontend
scripts.prod: npm run build:prod && npm run build --workspace=apps/electron && npm run start:prod:all
scripts.start:prod:all: npm run build:prod && npm run build --workspace=apps/electron && concurrently -n "backend,frontend,electron" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run start:prod --workspace=apps/backend" "npm run start:prod --workspace=apps/frontend" "npm run prod --workspace=apps/electron"
scripts.prod:backend: npm run build:prod --workspace=apps/backend && npm run start:prod --workspace=apps/backend
scripts.prod:frontend: npm run build:prod --workspace=apps/frontend && npm run start:prod --workspace=apps/frontend
scripts.prod:electron: npm run build --workspace=apps/electron && npm run prod --workspace=apps/electron
